headline: Umicore - Transparency notification by BlackRock, Inc.
summary: Transparency notification byBlackRock, Inc. In accordance with article 14, § 1 of the law of 2 May 2007 on the disclosure of major holdings, Umicore was recently notified by BlackRock, Inc. that it has crossed the legal threshold of 3% for the direct voting rights upwards on 10 October 2025. The total holding of direct voting rights and equivalent financial instruments of BlackRock, Inc. stands at 4.53% on 10 October 2025. Summary of the move: Date on which the threshold was crossedDate of notif

content.title: Umicore - Transparency notification by BlackRock, Inc.

headline: Peregrine Global 100 2025 Report: BlackRock Leads as Private Markets Face Growing Media Scrutiny
summary: NEW YORK & LONDON, October 16, 2025--Peregrine Communications, the leading marketing and communications firm for the asset management industry, today announced the findings of its Global 100 2025 Report, the leading benchmark of brand strength and marketing effectiveness among the world’s 100 largest asset management firms, ranked by AUM.

headline: Chip stocks rise after TSMC's rosy outlook on strong AI demand
summary: (Reuters) -Semiconductor stocks advanced on Thursday after top contract chipmaker TSMC (TSM) issued a rosy forecast, fanning optimism about demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure in a week of multi-billion-dollar deals across the sector.

content.title: Chip stocks rise after TSMC's rosy outlook on strong AI demand

headline: The Little-Known Crypto Powerhouse Behind Billions in Trading
summary: Known as Hyperliquid, it’s a booming platform for perpetual futures — never-expiring contracts that dominate crypto speculation, with monthly industry volumes above $6 trillion.  For all its popularity, Hyperliquid is still anchored by a small circle of insiders, raising questions about how decentralized it is.

content.title: The Little-Known Crypto Powerhouse Behind Billions in Trading
content.summary: Known as Hyperliquid, it’s a booming platform for perpetual futures — never-expiring contracts that dominate crypto speculation, with monthly industry volumes above $6 trillion.  For all its popularity, Hyperliquid is still anchored by a small circle of insiders, raising questions about how decentralized it is.

headline: Preqin Releases Private Markets in 2030 Report
summary: NEW YORK, October 16, 2025--Preqin, a part of BlackRock, today released its flagship annual private markets publication, this year titled the Preqin Private Markets in 2030 Report. As the definitive resource for institutional investors, fund managers, and industry stakeholders, this report offers one of the most thorough analyses of the trends shaping private markets through the end of the decade.

content.title: Preqin Releases Private Markets in 2030 Report

headline: Macquarie confident in AI, data centre future after $40 billion Aligned sale
summary: SYDNEY (Reuters) -The head of Australia's Macquarie Asset Management (MAM), which sold its Aligned Data Centers business in a deal worth $40 billion, said on Thursday the sale was not a sign the global data centre boom had peaked.  Aligned emerged as one of the world's largest data centre operators during the seven years it was owned by MAM, the funds management arm of investment bank Macquarie Group.  MAM head Ben Way said the decision to sell to investors including BlackRock, Microsoft and Nvidia, was not a warning sign for the sector or AI.

content.title: Macquarie confident in AI, data centre future after $40 billion Aligned sale
content.summary: SYDNEY (Reuters) -The head of Australia's Macquarie Asset Management (MAM), which sold its Aligned Data Centers business in a deal worth $40 billion, said on Thursday the sale was not a sign the global data centre boom had peaked.  Aligned emerged as one of the world's largest data centre operators during the seven years it was owned by MAM, the funds management arm of investment bank Macquarie Group.  MAM head Ben Way said the decision to sell to investors including BlackRock, Microsoft and Nvidia, was not a warning sign for the sector or AI.

headline: Heard on the Street Wednesday Recap: AI Fever
summary: Technology stocks including Intel and AMD rose, leading the Nasdaq up 0.7%. In the latest large deal linked to artificial intelligence, a BlackRock-led investor group said it will buy a big, privately held data-center operator for $40 billion including debt.

content.title: Heard on the Street Wednesday Recap: AI Fever
content.summary: Technology stocks including Intel and AMD rose, leading the Nasdaq up 0.7%. In the latest large deal linked to artificial intelligence, a BlackRock-led investor group said it will buy a big, privately held data-center operator for $40 billion including debt.

headline: Macquarie Asset's Way on the Biggest Data Center Deal
summary: Macquarie Asset Management has agreed to sell Aligned Data Centers to a group led by BlackRock's Global Infrastructure Partners, for $40 billion. The acquisition includes an investment from Mubadala's AI company MGX and is the biggest data-center deal in the world to date and the largest private equity deal ever. Ben Way, Head of Macquarie Asset Management spoke to Bloomberg's Horizons Middle East and Africa anchor Joumanna Bercetche on why this was the right time for their exit.

content.title: Macquarie Asset's Way on the Biggest Data Center Deal
content.description: Macquarie Asset Management has agreed to sell Aligned Data Centers to a group led by BlackRock's Global Infrastructure Partners, for $40 billion. The acquisition includes an investment from Mubadala's AI company MGX and is the biggest data-center deal in the world to date and the largest private equity deal ever. Ben Way, Head of Macquarie Asset Management spoke to Bloomberg's Horizons Middle East and Africa anchor Joumanna Bercetche on why this was the right time for their exit.
content.summary: Macquarie Asset Management has agreed to sell Aligned Data Centers to a group led by BlackRock's Global Infrastructure Partners, for $40 billion. The acquisition includes an investment from Mubadala's AI company MGX and is the biggest data-center deal in the world to date and the largest private equity deal ever. Ben Way, Head of Macquarie Asset Management spoke to Bloomberg's Horizons Middle East and Africa anchor Joumanna Bercetche on why this was the right time for their exit.

headline: BlackRock's Powell: China-US Too Dependent to Decouple
summary: Ben Powell of BlackRock Investment Institute says the US and China remain heavily interdependent and both sides will remain constrained when it comes to how aggressive they can be in a trade war.

content.title: BlackRock's Powell: China-US Too Dependent to Decouple
